job_description: hardware engineering job for the role Logic Design Engineer

• Basic understanding of tester logs and qualification test flows, along with familiarity using JIRA or similar issue-tracking tools.
• Associate degree in a STEM related field or 2 years industry experience.
• Or equivalent military training and experience.
• Ability to interpret test results, identify faults, and perform effective debugging and troubleshooting as needed.
• Communicate regularly with engineering teams regarding drive failures, tester issues, software/hardware needs Ensure compliance with Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) and Electrostatic Discharge (ESD) requirements Collaborate with Quality and Reliability Assurance (QRA) and Engineering teams to interpret failure data 2 years of experience in quality assurance or testing involving computer hardware and software.
• Complete test operations, qualification testing, and pretesting to confirm drive functionality 1 year of experience working with tester hardware and understanding its functionality.
• Understand and apply PQEAgent software and hardware tools used in reliability testing.
